DLG ITM_0

DLG ITM_0
You got a cup of tea! Nice.

DLG SPR_0
All of your worldly belongings sit in this box. A few changes of Cloth Shirts, a handful of copper coins, and a note from family down in the nearby village.

DLG SPR_1
"Well met, Sister!"

DLG SPR_2
"Our blades will fell these heretics! I hear them, coming up from the cellar doors!"

DLG SPR_3
Journal Entry (13/35): The growls grow louder each night, I'm certain the keep will fall. I hope the supplies I've kept stashed in The Arms Room Cellar will keep, for I may need them soon: and I hope no meddling adventurers catch scent of such a prize.

DLG SPR_4
"It's a soldier's life for me"

DLG SPR_5
"Purge with flames!"

DLG SPR_6
"Cleanse wi... hey, you're not supposed to be here? Get back to your post!"

DLG SPR_7
"Hey, Ma'am, I don't mean disrespect, but guarding the store-room seems a bit of a waste of resources? I mean who's gonna storm in through the -cellar-, a rat?"

DLG SPR_8
!Inventory Full!

DLG SPR_9
ARCHMAGE ANDARHOHL of the HIGH ORDER (Lvl 55 BOSS)

DLG SPR_a
A lock this ornate and well-sealed? The Archmage must be the owner of the key.

DLG SPR_b
The box is near empty, everything taken except for the note. No love for flavour text.

DLG SPR_c
"You sure about this? About just fleeing?" Fires start to rage in the fort above you both. The priestess here may have made up her mind, but the time left to make up yours is slipping away.

DLG SPR_d
"They don't... come here for moral reasons, for justice. They come here for treasure, for -fun-, as a stopping point on their violent climb"

DLG SPR_e
"You ever noticed how we can't leave out the front door? The stairs are right -here-"

DLG SPR_f
no loot? garbage. 

DLG SPR_g
Again? almost dinged.

DLG SPR_h
wanna skip optional? 

DLG SPR_i
"Hey uh... how did you... you're not supposed to be out here?

END 0
Keepguard Captain (BOSS, OPTIONAL) Defeated! Party gains 4510XP!

END 1
Stepping onto the cramped dinghy, you watch the keep above fall to flame. Part of you hopes that, as you drift away from shore, you can do better next time.

END 2
Resetting . . .
